verses.name: Genesis 34:5
verses.text: And Jacob heard that he had defiled Dinah his daughter: now his sons were with his cattle in the field: and Jacob held his peace until they were come.

verses.name: Genesis 34:6
verses.text: And Hamor the father of Shechem went out unto Jacob to commune with him.

verses.name: Genesis 34:7
verses.text: And the sons of Jacob came out of the field when they heard it: and the men were grieved, and they were very wroth, because he had wrought folly in Israel in lying with Jacob’s daughter; which thing ought not to be done.
